title: SoftBank’s Tech Boom Goes Bust—Again - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. SoftBank’s Tech Boom Goes Bust—Again  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Softbank Funds Post $27 Billion Loss  The New York Times

description: Speculative tech stocks, the company’s bread and butter, are crumbling fast. The worst may still be ahead.
